I laughed when I read this because there's a fic on ff.net that has 
Hijikata of all people hawking Shinsengumi related merchandise and one 
of those things is---Shinsengummies! I believe they were sake flavored.  
*smirk*

I think Saitou would be Soba flavored!

Okita--lollipop cherry

Hijikata----black licorice or sour apple

Yamanami--something bland like oatmeal

Kondou---something equally bland---overcooked unflavored rice

I'm not sure on the others






-- 
Barbara Sheridan	

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
